Episodes.Title: Pink Mug
Episodes.Plot: The pink mug is Morgan's favourite but it is also Amy's favourite mug... When the mug gets broken the "Fix It" Bananas step in.

Episodes.Title: Picnic Thieves
Episodes.Plot: The Bananas and Teddies are going on a picnic but the Bananas have forgotten to get any food. They decide that it's "Trick Time" and become "picnic thieves".

Episodes.Title: Moon Rocket
Episodes.Plot: Morgan is building a spaceship so that he can fly to the moon. When he disappears from the park Amy and Lulu think that he has gone to the moon without saying goodbye.

Episodes.Title: Night Fright
Episodes.Plot: The Bananas and Teddies decide to camp overnight in the Teddies' backyard. The Bananas scare the Teddies with strange noises.

Episodes.Title: Lost Shoe
Episodes.Plot: When Rat dresses up in a robe and crown, the Bananas stop by the store and mistake him for a real prince.

Episodes.Title: Hide and Seek
Episodes.Plot: It's raining outside so the Bananas and Teddies decide to play hide and seek inside. The Teddies hide and the Bananas look for them.

Episodes.Title: Music Box
Episodes.Plot: The Bananas in Pyjamas like fixing things. Morgan's music box is very quiet and Amy's radio is very loud, so the Bananas decide it's "fixing time".

Episodes.Title: See Saw
Episodes.Plot: Lulu and the Bananas make a see saw in the park, but they have some problems balancing the saw.

Episodes.Title: Buried Treasures
Episodes.Plot: Dolly and Camembert pretend to be ill when they see the attention they could get from the Bananas.

Episodes.Title: Grumpy Wumpy
Episodes.Plot: The Teddies have to clear autumn leaves from the park, but Morgan has woken up in a grumpy mood. The Bananas decide to help the Teddies and to cheer up Morgan.

Episodes.Title: Paper Chase
Episodes.Plot: It's a windy day and the beach is filled with newspaper. The Bananas start to clean up, wondering who is the litterbug.

Episodes.Title: The Storm
Episodes.Plot: One night there is a storm and the Bananas and Teddies are a bit scared. Morgan gets trapped in his room.

Episodes.Title: Quick Grow
Episodes.Plot: Rat convinces the Bananas into buying a map to a secret waterfall. However, the Bananas can't find it and try to return the map to Rat, but the tricky rodent simply sells them a new map, which ends up leading them into the Teddies' backyard!

Episodes.Title: The Parcel
Episodes.Plot: A very large box arrives at the Bananas house. It's a present for the Teddies. The Bananas and Teddies struggle to move the very large box through the Teddies door.

Episodes.Title: Sleeping Teddy
Episodes.Plot: Morgan's bike has been fixed and improved by the inventive Charlie and everyone wants to have a ride. Morgan is very protective of his bike and doesn't want anyone to use it until he rides it first, so he rides off before the others can find him.
